name: Trickstar Hoodie
text: If you control a "Trickstar" Fusion or Link Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Link Summon of a "Trickstar" monster: You can add 1 "Trickstar Fusion" or "Trickstar Diffusion" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Trickstar Hoodie" once per turn.
